title: "Decoding digital eye strain: Save yourself from dry eyes, itchiness, tearing, blurry vision, headaches"
excerpt: "Digital eye strain or DES, is a condition that arises from prolonged usage of digital electronic devices. It can lead to irritants like dry eyes, itchiness, excessive tearing, blurry vision, and headaches."
